queries.name: Refined Query V2 (Universal Measurement Property)
queries.description: Uses Component = Potassium electrolyte AND Property = Measurement property (universal parent of all quantitative measurement types like substance concentration, molar concentration, etc.). This captures all quantitative potassium measurements in blood.
